title: Question
description: On this page, you will see three images: a referent image in the first position and two related images positioned to the right of it. Your task is to choose the image that best represents the referent image.
question_explanation: Please choose the option you agree with the most about the displayed fundus image.
positive_answer: This image displays the signs of background
negative_answer: I believe that this image does not show any of the listed conditions.
unclear_image_answer: The image is not good enough for assessing the diagnosis.
certainty_question: How certain are you in your response?
thank_you_message: Thank you for completing the questionnaire!
iview_help_dialog_wl_message: Window/Level (Brightness/Contrast) Tool: Hold the right mouse button and drag.
iview_help_dialog_pan_message: Pan Image Tool: Hold the left mouse button and drag.
iview_help_dialog_zoom_message: Zoom In/Out Tool: Scroll the mouse wheel.
iview_help_dialog_rotate_message: Rotate Tool: Hold middle mouse click and drag.
iview_help_dialog_restore_message: Restore Image Transformations: Click on the appropriate button below the image viewer.
